title: Steve Matteson
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701011725/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701011725/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Steve Matteson**

Currently working for [Ascender Corp.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701011725/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ascender%20Corp.) in Elk Grove Village, Illinois, Steve formerly was at Monotype where he worked on the Windows core fonts. He is a graduate of Rochester Institute of Technology, having studied typography and printing. Among the many typefaces he has designed are Truedell, a Goudy revival, Goudy Ornate, Andalé, and Microsoft's company font Segoe.
